languages.text: "Истязаю?.." {n}Кибелла вздымает тонкую бровь.{/n} "Я несу на себе сакральные знаки служения Неумирающему. Стигматы, подаренные самой смертью. Мой долг — лелеять кровоточащие дары Его, когда иные лелеют пустое богатство или бессмысленную красоту. В каждом символе — смысл служения Ему. В каждой капле крови — благословение, дарованное Им. Отказаться от них значит отвернуться от самого Неумирающего".

"Torture?" {n}Kibellah arches an eyebrow.{/n} "I bear the sacred marks of the Undying One's service. Death has bestowed them upon me. Though others may cherish hollow riches or meaningless beauty, it is my duty to cherish His gift of blood. Each wound is a symbol of our service to Him. Each drop of blood carries His blessing. To renounce these scars is to renounce the Undying One Himself."
languages.original_text: "Истязаю?.." {n}Кибелла вздымает тонкую бровь.{/n} "Я несу на себе сакральные знаки служения Неумирающему. Стигматы, подаренные самой смертью. Мой долг — лелеять кровоточащие дары Его, когда иные лелеют пустое богатство или бессмысленную красоту. В каждом символе — смысл служения Ему. В каждой капле крови — благословение, дарованное Им. Отказаться от них значит отвернуться от самого Неумирающего".

traits.locale_text: "Torture?" {n}Kibellah arches an eyebrow.{/n} "I bear the sacred marks of the Undying One's service. Death has bestowed these stigmata upon me. My duty is to cherish His bleeding gifts while others cherish hollow riches or meaningless beauty. Each symbol holds the purpose of toiling in His name. Each drop of blood holds His blessing. To renounce them is to renounce the Undying One Himself."

"Torture?" {n}Kibellah arches an eyebrow.{/n} "I bear the sacred marks of the Undying One's service. Death has bestowed these stigmata upon me. My duty is to cherish His bleeding gifts while others cherish hollow riches or meaningless beauty. Each symbol holds the purpose of toiling in His name. Each drop of blood holds His blessing. To renounce them is to renounce the Undying One Himself."

To renounce these scars is to renounce the Undying One Himself."

languages.text: «¿Torturarme?». {n}Kibellah enarca una ceja.{/n} «Son marcas sagradas del servicio al Inmortal que llevo con orgullo. La muerte me las ha concedido. Otros valoran las riquezas materiales o la belleza inane, pero mi deber es atesorar Su don de sangre. Cada herida es un símbolo del servicio que le profesamos. Cada gota de sangre va impregnada de Su bendición. Renunciar a estos estigmas sería como renunciar al propio Inmortal».
languages.original_text: "Torture?" {n}Kibellah arches an eyebrow.{/n} "I bear the sacred marks of the Undying One's service. Death has bestowed them upon me. Though others may cherish hollow riches or meaningless beauty, it is my duty to cherish His gift of blood. Each wound is a symbol of our service to Him. Each drop of blood carries His blessing. To renounce these scars is to renounce the Undying One Himself."

Cada gota de sangre va impregnada de Su bendición. Renunciar a estos estigmas sería como renunciar al propio Inmortal».

languages.text: 「拷問？」{n}キベラが片眉を跳ね上げる。{/n}「私は不死の者に仕える神聖なしるしを持っている。死が授けてくれたものよ。他の者であれば中途半端な富や無意味な美を求めるかもしれないけれど、血という種の恵みを求めるのが私の使命。傷の一つ一つが主への奉仕の象徴。血の一滴一滴が主の祝福を運んでくれる。これらの傷を手放すのは、不死の者そのものを手放すことに等しい」
languages.original_text: "Torture?" {n}Kibellah arches an eyebrow.{/n} "I bear the sacred marks of the Undying One's service. Death has bestowed them upon me. Though others may cherish hollow riches or meaningless beauty, it is my duty to cherish His gift of blood. Each wound is a symbol of our service to Him. Each drop of blood carries His blessing. To renounce these scars is to renounce the Undying One Himself."

traits.locale_text: 「拷問？」{n}キベラが片眉を跳ね上げる。{/n}「私は不死の者に仕える神聖なしるしを持っている。死が授けてくれたものよ。他の者であれば中途半端な富や無意味な美を求めるかもしれないけれど、血という種の恵みを求めるのが私の使命。傷の一つ一つが主への奉仕の象徴。血の一滴一滴が主の祝福を運んでくれる。これらの傷を手放すのは、不死の者そのものを手放すことに等しい」

languages.text: “折磨？”{n}绮贝菈扬起一条眉毛。{/n}“我身上带着不死之神的神圣印记，是死亡赐予了我这样的印记。尽管其他人可能更珍惜空洞的财富或毫无意义的美貌，但我更珍惜祂的鲜血之礼，这是我的职责所在。每个伤口都是我们侍奉祂的象征，每滴血都承载着祂的祝福。放弃这些伤疤，就等同于背弃了不死之神。”
languages.original_text: "Torture?" {n}Kibellah arches an eyebrow.{/n} "I bear the sacred marks of the Undying One's service. Death has bestowed them upon me. Though others may cherish hollow riches or meaningless beauty, it is my duty to cherish His gift of blood. Each wound is a symbol of our service to Him. Each drop of blood carries His blessing. To renounce these scars is to renounce the Undying One Himself."

traits.locale_text: “折磨？”{n}绮贝菈扬起一条眉毛。{/n}“我身上带着不死之神的神圣印记，是死亡赐予了我这样的印记。尽管其他人可能更珍惜空洞的财富或毫无意义的美貌，但我更珍惜祂的鲜血之礼，这是我的职责所在。每个伤口都是我们侍奉祂的象征，每滴血都承载着祂的祝福。放弃这些伤疤，就等同于背弃了不死之神。”

languages.text: "Folter?" {n}Kibellah hebt eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Ich trage die heiligen Male der Dienste für den Todlosen. Der Tod hat sie mir beigebracht. Andere mögen hohlen Reichtum oder sinnlose Schönheit anstreben, doch meine Pflicht lautet, Sein Blutgeschenk zu ehren. Jede Wunde ist ein Symbol für unseren Dienst an Ihm. Jeder Blutstropfen trägt Seinen Segen. Sich von diesen Narben loszusagen, würde bedeuten, sich vom Todlosen selbst loszusagen."
languages.original_text: "Torture?" {n}Kibellah arches an eyebrow.{/n} "I bear the sacred marks of the Undying One's service. Death has bestowed them upon me. Though others may cherish hollow riches or meaningless beauty, it is my duty to cherish His gift of blood. Each wound is a symbol of our service to Him. Each drop of blood carries His blessing. To renounce these scars is to renounce the Undying One Himself."

Andere mögen hohlen Reichtum oder sinnlose Schönheit anstreben, doch meine Pflicht lautet, Sein Blutgeschenk zu ehren. Jede Wunde ist ein Symbol für unseren Dienst an Ihm. Jeder Blutstropfen trägt Seinen Segen. Sich von diesen Narben loszusagen, würde bedeuten, sich vom Todlosen selbst loszusagen."

languages.text: « Quels sévices ? {n}demande Kibellah en haussant un sourcil.{/n} Je porte les marques sacrées des serviteurs de l'Immortel. C'est la mort elle-même qui me les a conférées. Si d'autres chérissent les vaines promesses des biens matériels ou de la beauté physique, il est de mon devoir de chérir Son don de sang. Chaque lésion est un symbole de notre dévouement envers Lui. Chaque goutte de sang porte en son sein Sa bénédiction. Renoncer à ces cicatrices reviendrait à renier l'Immortel Lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "Torture?" {n}Kibellah arches an eyebrow.{/n} "I bear the sacred marks of the Undying One's service. Death has bestowed them upon me. Though others may cherish hollow riches or meaningless beauty, it is my duty to cherish His gift of blood. Each wound is a symbol of our service to Him. Each drop of blood carries His blessing. To renounce these scars is to renounce the Undying One Himself."

To renounce these scars is to renounce the Undying One Himself."

languages.text: "Eziyet mi?" {n}Kibellah, tek kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Ölmeyen'e hizmetimin kutsal işaretlerini taşıyorum. Bunları bana ölüm bahşetti. Başkaları içi boş bir servete veya anlamsız güzelliğe önem verirken bana düşen vazife, O'nun armağanı olan kanın kıymetini bilmektir. Her bir yara, O'na hizmetimizin sembolüdür. Her damla kan, O'nun nimetidir. Bu yara izlerini reddetmek demek, O'nu reddetmek demektir."
languages.original_text: "Torture?" {n}Kibellah arches an eyebrow.{/n} "I bear the sacred marks of the Undying One's service. Death has bestowed them upon me. Though others may cherish hollow riches or meaningless beauty, it is my duty to cherish His gift of blood. Each wound is a symbol of our service to Him. Each drop of blood carries His blessing. To renounce these scars is to renounce the Undying One Himself."
